last-conf-title: INNOVATIONS IN FOREIGN LANGUAGE TEACHING IN THE ERA OF GLOBALIZATION AND SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT
last-conf-desc: On November 18, 2025, a scientific and practical conference entitled “Innovations in Foreign Language Teaching in the Era of Globalization and Sustainable Development” was held. The conference focused on modern approaches and innovative methods in foreign language teaching in the context of globalization and sustainable development. Participants shared their experiences, presented research findings, and discussed current issues related to improving the quality of language
